title: Anne Rice
summary:
Anne Rice[1] (born Howard Allen Frances O'Brien; October 4, 1941)[2] is an American author of gothic fiction, Christian literature, and erotic literature.
She is best known for her series of novels The Vampire Chronicles. Books from The Vampire Chronicles were the subject of two film adaptationsâ€”Interview with the Vampire (1994) and Queen of the Damned (2002).
